=== Self Primitive Datatypes===
numbers:
{{{
<!--include file="JSON_lastest.asp"-->
<%
Response.Write toJSON(1989)
%>
}}}
strings:
{{{
<!--include file="JSON_lastest.asp"-->
<%
Response.Write toJSON("やあ")
%>
}}}
date & times:
{{{
<!--include file="JSON_lastest.asp"-->
<%
Response.Write toJSON(Now())
%>
}}}
single dimension arrays:
{{{
<!--include file="JSON_lastest.asp"-->
<%
Response.Write toJSON(Array("a","l","i"))
%>
}}}
multi dimension arrays:
{{{
<!--include file="JSON_lastest.asp"-->
<%
Dim x(1,1,1)
x(0,0,0) = "threedot"
x(0,0,1) = 2
Set x(0,1,0) = jsObject()
x(0,1,1) = 6
x(1,0,0) = Array(Date(), 19, "threedot")
x(1,0,1) = 8
x(1,1,0) = 10
x(1,1,1) = "やあ"
%>
}}}
